name: Rush Rush!
description:
You are running on a track, when you run through a colorfield you change the color. You must collect little men with the same color you wear. When you collect a wrong man you lose a life and begin again at the start. In the end of the track awaits you an endboss.

Moving is with cursor-keys, fighting is with space-bar

(In the begin you must press space and then return)
